thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great view, great location.
thread.title_full: Great view, great location. - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PTJ20
title: Great view, great location.
text:
Stayed here for 5 nights on my honeymoon. We had a room on one of the higher floors. The balcony was fantastic and looked over an athletics track directly in front and the Eiffel Tower to the right. The Eiffel Tower was magical at night time. We took the chaise lounge chair out onto the balcony in the evenings to watch the tower glisten in the sky. The balcony faced West towards the afternoon sun so it was great to sit on the balcony, take in the sun and watch the sights of Paris go by. The room itself was clean and comfortable. The bed was massive! The breakfast was fantastic too from memory. Lots of selection and a great start to each day. I would definitely return.
